about.title: About Tlemcen Smart Supermarket
about.subtitle: Your trusted destination for quality and convenience in Tlemcen.
about.p1: At Tlemcen Smart Supermarket, we are dedicated to providing our community with the finest shopping experience. Our journey began with a simple vision: to create a modern, convenient, and smart grocery store that caters to the needs of modern life in Tlemcen.
about.p2: We carefully select every item on our shelves, prioritizing fresh, local produce to ensure you get the best quality while supporting local farmers and producers. From vibrant fruits and vegetables to premium dairy, tender meats, and fresh bakery items, we offer a wide selection to meet all your needs.
about.p3: With our online platform, we're taking convenience to the next level. Shop from the comfort of your home and enjoy fast, reliable delivery to your doorstep. Our mission is to make grocery shopping a seamless and enjoyable experience for our valued customers.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help! Send us a message or stop by for a visit.

form.title: Send us a Message

form.subject: Subject
form.success_desc: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

legal.p1_text: Welcome to Tlemcen Smart Supermarket. This Privacy Policy governs your access to and use of our services.
legal.p2_text: We collect various types of information in connection with our services, including:
legal.p2_l1: Information you provide directly to us (e.g., account information).
legal.p2_l2: Information we collect automatically (e.g., usage data).
legal.p3_text: We use the information we collect to operate, improve, personalize, and develop our services.
legal.p4_text: We may share your information with third parties in limited circumstances, including: with your consent, with our service providers, or for legal reasons.
legal.p5_text: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.
legal.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
legal.t1_text: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
legal.t2_text: You must follow any policies made available to you within the Service. Don't misuse our Services.
legal.t3_text: You may need an account to use some of our Services. You are responsible for safeguarding your account.
legal.t4_text: We are constantly changing and improving our Services. We may add or remove functionalities or features.
legal.t5_text: To the extent permitted by law, Tlemcen Smart Supermarket will not be responsible for lost profits, revenues, or data.
